name: SANDHYU
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText:
YOU ARE MY BRAINCELL!!!!
THANK YOU FOR BEING MY LIGHT IN THE DARK.
THANK YOU FOR PUSHING ME WHEN I DIDN'T KNOW HOW TO START.
THANK YOU FOR THE UNCOUNTABLE TIMES YOU MADE ME SMILE.
THANK YOU FOR REMINDING ME THAT MY EFFORTS AREN'T FUTILE.
THANK YOU FOR HELPING ME SHARE THE TEARS THAT I HID.
THANK YOU FOR RANDOMLY WALKING INTO MY LIFE.
 AND WHENEVER YOU NEED ME, I PROMISE STICK BY YOUR SIDE
 LOVE YOU SO MUCH BUBU ‚ù£Ô∏èüí´
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click Refresh, if you want to watch it again.
